attributes.action: To bring back glass cola bottles
attributes.background: I want there to be glass bottles instead of plastic bottles because the plastic pollutes the earth.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because It’s about something that the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for. This would be the responsibility of the manufacturer. 

You could start a new petition calling for a ban on the sale and manufacture of single use plastic bottles, if that's something you'd like to see happen. 

You might also like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231235
